item.title: Icons
item.dc:creator: @i_own_u1 i_own__u
item.description:
@i_own_u1 wrote:

[quote=“bmxr4c3r709, post:3, topic:115186”]How did you get 23 rep if you don’t even know where to put it???

  1. Open up client.java and search for public void

2)Scroll under the first one you see and add it(That would be after the last } and before the next ‘public void’)[/quote]

21 rep and cant replace a magic spell (saw at lescape command & code factory).
so rep++ doesnt mean anything so stfu.
